short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quotible Extension for Interacting with CRM Leads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Quotible Chrome Extension allows a salesperson to extract leads from their CRM into the Quotible Quote Builder to deliver an interactive automotive response sent via email and sms.
